name: MemoryMe
description:
Title: MemoryMe 

brain training game for every age casual get high scores for challenging yourself.

this project is for education on how to publish on the play store and ads work.

this game is available on android play store it has ads but you can disable your wifi for blocking ads.

hope you like my game and support me, Thank you.

Control: mouse
